name.th: บาลดิส เบสิกส์ ปลดล็อค

short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Baldis Basics Unblocked as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Играйте Baldis Basics Unblocked като разширение за Chrome - Можете да играете и без интернет, опитайте сега!
short.ca: Juega a Baldis Basics sin bloqueo como una extensión de Chrome. Además, ¡puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora mismo!
short.cs: Hrajte Baldis Basics Unblocked jako rozšíření pro Chrome - Můžete také hrát bez připojení k internetu, vyzkoušejte to teď!
short.da: Spil Baldis Basics Unblocked som en Chrome-udvidelse - Kan også spilles uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de: Spielen Sie Baldis Basics Unblocked als Chrome-Erweiterung - Sie können es auch ohne Internet spielen, probieren Sie es jetzt aus!
short.el: Juega Baldis Basics Desbloqueado como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.es: Juega a Baldis Basics desbloqueado como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Speel Baldis Basics Unblocked as 'n Chrome-uitbreiding - Jy kan ook sonder internet speel, probeer dit nou!
short.fi: Pelaa Baldis Basicsia estämättömänä Chrome-laajennuksena - Voit myös pelata ilman internetyhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: I-play ang Baldis Basics Unblocked bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari rin na Makapaglaro na Walang Internet, subukan mo ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Baldis Basics débloqué en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans internet, essayez maintenant !
short.he: Jouez à Baldis Basics débloqué en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.hi: Juega Baldis Basics desbloqueado como una extensión de Chrome - ¡También puedes jugar sin internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.hr: Igrajte Baldis Basics odblokirano kao Chrome proširenje - Također možete igrati bez interneta, isprobajte sada!
short.hu: Játssza a Baldis Basics Unblocked-ot Chrome bővítményként - Próbálja ki most, internet nélkül is!
short.id,ms: Mainkan Baldis Basics Unblocked sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga bisa dimainkan tanpa internet, coba sekarang!
short.it: Jouez à Baldis Basics Unblocked en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez maintenant !
short.ja: クロム拡張機能としてBaldis Basics Unblockedをプレイしてください - インターネットなしでもプレイできます、今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램으로 Baldis Basics Unblocked를 플레이하세요 - 또한 인터넷 없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite "Baldis Basics" atblokuotą versiją kaip "Chrome" plėtinį - Be to, galite žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlējiet Baldis pamatinformāciju bez bloķēšanas kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Tāpat varat spēlēt bez interneta, izmēģiniet tagad!
short.nl: Speel Baldis Basics Unblocked als een Chrome-extensie - Je kunt ook spelen zonder internet, probeer het nu!
short.no: Juega Baldis Basics Desbloqueado como una extensión para Chrome. ¡Además, puedes jugar sin conexión a internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.pl: Odtwarzaj Baldis Basics odblokowane jako rozszerzenie Chrome - Możesz również grać bez internetu, wypróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă Baldis Basics Unblocked ca o extensie Chrome - De asemenea, poți juca fără internet, încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Балди Основы Unblocked как расширение для Chrome - Также можно играть без интернета, попробуйте прямо сейчас!
short.sk: Play Baldis Basics Unblocked as a Chrome extension - Also can play without internet, try it now!
short.sr: Играйте Балдијеве основне спореднике без блокирања као Цхроме проширење - Исто тако можете играти без интернета, покушајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Baldis Basics olåst som en Chrome-förlängning - Kan också spelas utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่นเกม Baldis Basics Unblocked เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.tr: Şimdi Baldis Basics Unblocked'ı bir Chrome uzantısı olarak oyna - Ayrıca İnternet olmadan da oynayabilirsiniz, şimdi deneyin!
short.uk: Грайте в Baldis Basics Unblocked як розширення Chrome - Також можна грати без Інтернету, спробуйте зараз!
short.vi: Chơi Baldis Basics Unblocked như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 作为Chrome扩展程序玩Baldis Basics Unblocked - 同时也可以在没有网络的情况下玩，现在试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 在 Chrome 擴充程式中播放 Baldis Basics Unblocked - 也可以在無網路的情況下進行遊玩，立即試試看！

long.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,:
Play other games on the top-left menu.
📚🎓 Baldi's Basics for Chrome - Quirky Educational Fun! 🎮🍎

Dive into the unconventional world of Baldi's Basics right in your Chrome browser! 🌐 This educational horror game takes a unique approach to learning, challenging players with quirky puzzles and unexpected surprises.

👨‍🏫 Meet Baldi: Join the eccentric Baldi in a Chrome-compatible version of the game. Will you solve math problems and navigate the surreal school environment without falling prey to Baldi's antics?

🎮 Game Features:

Chrome Compatibility: Play seamlessly in your Chrome browser, no need for additional downloads!
Educational Mayhem: Experience the perfect blend of education and horror as you explore the eccentricities of Baldi's Basics.
Quirky Puzzles: Solve math problems and face challenges that keep you on your toes - Baldi's school is no ordinary place!
Unexpected Twists: Brace yourself for unexpected surprises and hilarious moments as you navigate the unconventional learning environment.
💻 How to Play:

Launch in Chrome: Find the game on Chrome Web Store or a trusted gaming website.
Navigate the School: Explore the bizarre school setting, solve math problems, and avoid Baldi's peculiar punishments.
Survive the Challenges: Face quirky challenges and unexpected twists, all while attempting to escape Baldi's clutches.
Get ready for an educational adventure like no other, right in your Chrome browser! Will you make it out of Baldi's school with your sanity intact, or will you succumb to the whimsical chaos? 🎒📏🏫
long.bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fi,fil,fr,he,hi,: Baldi's Basics Unblocked: Embark on an unbridled journey into the eccentric and challenging realm of Baldi's Basics, free from any inhibitions! In this unblocked version, navigate through the peculiar school, tackle math problems, and collect notebooks to outsmart Baldi's pursuit. Delve into the zany and unpredictable gameplay without constraints, braving unexpected twists and turns. Can you endure the educational chaos and emerge unscathed? Put your wit and agility to the test in Baldi's Basics Unblocked! 📚🧑‍🏫
